text: Quick and Faster UV Creation by using a point Cluster.  Any Questions, recommendations or bugs, email Oliver Hotz @ oliver@heimlich.net.

The UV Cluster by Points lets you quickly segment models based on a simple point grid.  Each Cluster will be put into its own UDIM Tile.  Please keep in mind, depending on model density, that packing can introduce slowness.
The number of points (grid) you want to use.  The higher the Divisions, the smaller the clusters become, therefore, increasing the quantity of clusters.
The amount of tiles in the U (right) direction before going up in V.
The amount of spacing between islands.  Generally, you want some spacing to be able to bleed textures past their edges correctly.
The amount of spacing from the edge of the UDIM Tile.
This option will also pack each UDIM tile.  While this gives better coverage, it comes with a steep performance hit, depending on how dense your geometry is.
